attributes.action: Wrexam to London Paddington New service with Great Westen Trains.
attributes.additional_details: I would love a regular train service from Wrexam to London Paddington, as everyone keeps insisting on a sevice to London, but why not go to Paddington, saving taxpayers thousands of pounds every year in council tax as you would not have rival fans changing trains at the same time at either Wolverhampton or Birmingham, it will also open up Business, Tourism, visiting family and friends both ends of the route,  meaning cheaper fares to London from Wrexam and The Midlands and you only need to catch one train instead of changing at Wolverhampton, Birmingham or Reading.
